name: Hentai Royale
description:
Hentai Royale is a dynamic third-person shooter set on a colorful island. You play as an operative of the secret service H. E. N. T. A. I. Your goal is to explore the location and find all the strategically important hentai drawings hidden here. Use a wide arsenal of weapons to defend yourself from the mercenaries who will surely try to stop you. And hurry up, because the death zone is constantly expanding, it will not allow you to sit still.

Main Features


  • Colorful open world
  • Different types of enemies
  • A wide arsenal of weapons
  • Wonderful hentai drawings!
